title: 登录插件问题求教！
author: wban
txt_content: 我开了一个小型服务器可以有好多玩家发现进不去服务器出现一排字母（见上图)有人说是登录插件的问题希望有大神来帮下忙！

replies.author: wban
replies.txt_content:
字上面啊- -
算了我打一遍吧- -
Your country is banned form this server
这不是被ban了，我查了ban名单没有

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
是这样的 修改一下插件配置（用notepad++修改）
在./plugins/Authme/config.yml
找到  banUnsafedIP: true复制代码
修改成banUnsafedIP: false复制代码

replies.author: wban
replies.txt_content:
1748591300 发表于 2015-7-23 13:36
是这样的 修改一下插件配置（用notepad++修改）
在./plugins/Authme/config.yml
找到   
我配置里面本来就是false

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
wban 发表于 2015-7-23 13:55
我配置里面本来就是falseProtection:
    # Enable some servers protection ( country based login, antibot )
    enableProtection: false
    # Countries allowed to join the server and register, see http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/authme-reloaded/pages/countries-codes/ for countries' codes
    countries:
    - US
    - GB
    - CN
    # Countries blacklisted automatically ( without any needed to enable protection )
    countriesBlacklist:
    - A1
    # Do we need to enable automatic antibot system?
    enableAntiBot: false
    # Max number of player allowed to login in 5 secs before enable AntiBot system automatically
    antiBotSensibility: 99
    # Duration in minutes of the antibot automatic system
    antiBotDuration: 10复制代码

replies.author: Doby_
replies.txt_content:
删除 countriesBlacklist:

11.    - A1

  删除此处的 - A1

replies.author: cai1999627
replies.txt_content:
这段英文的意思是：你的国家/地区被这个服务器ban(封禁)了！
麻烦你检查一下你这个登陆插件的配置文件 应该有更改的地方的

replies.author: Yuxi_Jun
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: wban
replies.txt_content:
Yuxi_Jun 发表于 2015-7-24 01:39
6楼说的删除那个，我删了结果没用，，
authme最新版增加了限制国家
所以还是降低authme插件的版本最好！ ...
哪个版本没有国家限制？
